techmeme.title: Halliday, which helps developers delegate workflows to autonomous systems when creating smart contracts, raised a $20M Series A led by a16z Crypto (MK Manoylov/The Block)
Google launches new Search and Android health features, including medical records APIs, and plans to release open AI models for drug discovery called TxGemma (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Google says Wiz will join Google Cloud and Wiz's products will continue to work "across all major clouds", including AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Oracle Cloud (Andrew Martin/Bloomberg)
Google acquires NYC-based cybersecurity startup Wiz for $32B in cash, its largest acquisition yet, pending approval; antitrust fears stalled a $23B deal in 2024 (The Verge)
Solana deleted a social media ad for its conference in May 2025 after the crypto community criticized it for insensitivity towards gender issues (Timmy Shen/The Block)
